Vampirtron:

     Vampirtron had rested for a bit in his room, when he got bored he got up and walked out, into the ship. He was admiring the Maximal's design of the ship, they almost seemed perfect, yet flawed as well.

     Eventually he found his way outside, he transformed to beast mode and started to wander the wilds. About a mile away from the ship he noticed a bird flying overhead, he did a quick scan and found that it had a Maximal signal*. So Vampirtron ran into a field and let out a deep, long howl. After that he transformed to robot mode, and stood with one knee on a big rock, watching the bird, to see if it would land.

(*The signal is Condor)

<P>Vampirtron:</P>
<P>     Vampirtron had rested for a bit in his room, when he got bored he got up and walked out, into the ship. He was admiring the Maximal's design of the ship, they almost seemed perfect, yet flawed as well.</P>
<P>     Eventually he found his way outside, he transformed to beast mode and started to wander the wilds. About a mile away from the ship he noticed a bird flying overhead, he did a quick scan and found that it had a Maximal signal*. So Vampirtron ran into a field and let out a deep, long howl. After that he transformed to robot mode, and stood with one knee on a big rock, watching the bird, to see if it would land.</P>
<P>(*The signal is Condor)</P><BR><BR><p><br><hr size=1><b>Do You Yahoo!?</b><br>
